entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting error on code that is not generated in MAUI #14430
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14429
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14428
  • OnIdom or StaticResource typo's create an app crash in release mode #14427
  • Maui : iOS - Switch color doesn't revert on off #14426
  • MAUI XAML build error when using Data Template and binding #14425
  • Delete and Add a row messes up the sequencing in a custom grid control #14424
  • Custom controls pushing 'buttons' out of view results in loss of event clicked processing #14423
  • The .NET MAUI base template project doesn't compile #14422
  • Maui app black screen in ipad (iPadOS 16.4) #14421
  • The default MAUI app template should disable Catalyst on Windows #14419
  • [Android] VerticalStackLayout inside of ScrollView doesn't center #14418
  • iOS Crash CarouselView has MediaElement in ItemTemplate #14417
  • Why if I use a command to back to previous page it is not animated in a MAUI application? #14415
  • .NET MAUI WebView cannot open links to websites other than its source #14414
  • Image size constraints don't work properly #14411
  • [iOS] Black screen on launch #14408
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support transparent page background in iOS #14407
    Backlog
  • [iOS and Mac] - Blank rendering in FlowDirection right to left from .net 7.0 #14406
  • Button properties are inconsistent when applying android themes #14404

Closed

  • Can't set the app name in MacCatalyst project for macOS #12287
    Backlog
  • Upgrading to Visual Studio 17.5 broke MAUI Windows Slider #13917
    Backlog
  • DeploymentManagerAutoInitializer currently not working as intended #14105
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CarouselView "Scrolled" event never fires #12725
    .NET 8
  • Shell.Title and Window.Title currently doesn't propagate to the catalyst window title #11263
    Backlog
  • [Android] Image is clipped during animation #7182

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Prepare the maui-template to work out of the repo pipeline. #14420
  • Propagate Title to android and ios window #14413
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border

Merged

  • Remove Deployment Manager workaround #14398
    backport/suggested
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] [CI] Fix the maui-tempaltes yaml to work in the unified pipeline. #14416
  • [net7.0] Hook up CarouselView Scrolled event on Windows #14409
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [CI] Fix the maui-tempaltes yaml to work in the unified pipeline. #14396
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14400
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.2 to 4.1.3 #14384
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Propagate title property to catalyst window #14399
    backport/suggested
  • Hook up CarouselView Scrolled event on Windows #14405
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • [net7.0] Fix incorrect caching of unconstrained measures (#14373) #14389

Updated

  • Keyboard test fixes v2 #14397
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
